eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.ranking

Class ThresholdRanking

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.smartdatalake.simsearch.ranking.ThresholdRanking
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RankAggregator

    public class ThresholdRanking
extends java.lang.Object
implements RankAggregator
    Implementation of the threshold-based rank aggregation algorithm.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ThresholdRanking

        public ThresholdRanking(java.util.List<java.util.HashMap<?,?>> datasets,
                        java.util.List<ISimilarity> similarities,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.Double> weights,
                        java.util.List<INormal> normalizations,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.Thread> tasks,
                        java.util.List<java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<Result>> queues,
                        java.util.List<java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean> runControl,
                        int topk,
                        java.io.PrintStream outStream,
                        java.lang.String outColumnDelimiter,
                        boolean outHeader,
                        java.io.PrintStream logStream)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        datasets - List of the various data collections involved in the similarity search queries.
        similarities - List of the similarity measures applied in each search query.
        weights - List of the weights to be applied in similarity scores returned by each search query.
        normalizations - List of normalization functions to be applied in data values during random access.
        tasks - The list of running threads; each one executes a query and it is associated with its respective queue that collects its results.
        queues - The list of the queues collecting results from each search query.
        runControl - The list of boolean values indicating the status of each thread.
        topk - The count of ranked aggregated results to collect, i.e., those with the top-k (highest) aggregated similarity scores.
        outStream - Handle to the output file.
        outColumnDelimiter - Delimiter character of results written to the output file.
        outHeader - Header (column names) in the output file.
        logStream - Handle to the log file for notifications and execution statistics.

    • Method Detail

      • updateRankedList

        private boolean updateRankedList(int i)
        Inserts or updates the ranked aggregated results based on a result from the i-queue
        Parameters:
        i - The queue that provides the new result
        Returns:
        True, if the ranked aggregated list has been updated; otherwise, False.

      • updateScoreRandomAccess

        private double updateScoreRandomAccess(AggregateResult res)
        Calculates the total aggregated score of a query result by randomly accessing its attribute values.
        Parameters:
        res - The query result.
        Returns:
        The aggregated score after estimating the missing scores in unseen attributes.

      • proc

        public boolean proc()
        Implements the processing logic of the threshold-based algorithm.
        Specified by:
        proc in interface RankAggregator
        Returns:
        True, if the process is still running and less than top-k results have been issued; otherwise, False.
